answers.answer: I had this same problem and learned that I was severely anemic so they put me on the iron tablet so next time you go to your doctor ask about your iron level or it could just be anxiety because I have that too but I also had to have a diabetes test ran because those are diabetes symptoms so ask your doctorabout that also

They dont do diabetes testing until 20 weeks here i asked already. my blood pressure is low but normal. I had my first prenatal testing done 3 weeks ago at 12 weeks. but everything was 100% fine. but i go in a week again so well see. thanks for answering
I had the same.problem.and I was alsoAnemic and it got to the point where I collapsed twice so id go and get checked over

question: Im 15 + 1 with my second baby. the past week iv been getting horrible headaches. now tonight as i was making supper i got really dizzy. started having hot flashes. felt very nauseous. and the headache got worse. Its just about 5 am and i can't sleep because of it.
title: What could cause this??
